lexa.core.expression

Class LogicalAnd

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.expression.Expression
      • lexa.core.expression.MultipleExpression
        • lexa.core.expression.LogicalAnd

  • class LogicalAnd
extends MultipleExpression
    Perform a logical AND on the results from the expressions.

    Each expression must return results of type Boolean.

    If any result is null, the return will be null, otherwise it will be true or false depending on the result.

    If any expression returns null or false, then no further expressions are evaluated.

    Since:
    2013-03
    Author:
    William

      • validate

        protected boolean validate(java.lang.Object result)
                    throws ExpressionException
        Checks if the result of an evaluation is valid.
        The result is valid if it is not null and can be caste to a Boolean.
        Overrides:
        validate in class MultipleExpression
        Parameters:
        result - the result from an evaluated expression.
        Returns:
        true if the result is valid.
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when an error occurs in validating the result.

      • complete

        protected boolean complete(java.lang.Object overall)
        Check if processing is completed.
        Once the overall result is false then processing is complete.
        Overrides:
        complete in class MultipleExpression
        Parameters:
        overall - the existing result from the previously evaluated expressions.
        Returns:
        true if the result is set to false.

      • combine

        protected java.lang.Object combine(java.lang.Object overall,
                                   java.lang.Object result)
                            throws ExpressionException
        Combines the existing overall result with the new result.

        As evaluation stops at any false result, the overall value will always be true. As a result this method will just return the result.

        Specified by:
        combine in class MultipleExpression
        Parameters:
        overall - the existing result from the previously evaluated expressions.
        result - the result from an evaluated expression.
        Returns:
        The combined result.
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when an error occurs in combining the result.
